decision_conditions: The development to which this permission relates shall be begun not later than the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.

Reason: To comply with Section 91 of the Town & Country Planning Act 1990. | The development hereby approved shall be carried out in accordance with the following drawings / document title number(s): Revision E - Proposed Elevations drawing no.P.01, Proposed Floor Plans drawing no.P.02, Proposed Sections drawing no.P.03, Proposed Ground Floor Plans drawing no.P.04 and Proposed First and Second Floor, Floor Plans drawing no.P.05
Reason: For the avoidance of doubt, and in the interests of proper planning.
| All external materials to be used in the development shall match the appearance of those of the existing building, unless otherwise stated in the submitted application form or approved drawings.

Reason: To ensure that the materials harmonise with the host property and local area, in accordance with Policies D3, D4 and HC1 of the London Plan (2021), Policies 7.4, 7B and 7C of Adopted Ealing Development Management Plan Document (2013), and the Ealing Local Plan 2022 (Reg 19).

| The hereby approved rooflights to the front roof slope of the hereby development shall be Conservation style rooflights and lie flush with the roof and shall be retained as such for the lifetime of the development.

Reason:  To ensure that the materials harmonise with the surroundings, and to safeguard the character and appearance of the conservation area in accordance with national Planning Policy Framework 2023(Updated) (section 16) policies D4 and HC1 of the London Plan (2021), policies 7B and 7C of the Ealing Development Management DPD (2013), Generic Conservation Area Management Plan and Mill Hill Park Conservation Area Character Addendum July 2023.
description: Single storey rear extension (following demolition of existing rear addition); front porch extension; rear roof extension and installation of two rooflights to front roofslope
